isis.stitle: HYDRO-MAX™ BRAKE BOOSTER AND MASTER CYLINDER - DESCRIPTION - MASTER CYLINDER ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: MASTER CYLINDER ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 1 for all items in parentheses.

The master cylinder (Item 6) and reservoir (Item 5) contain two brake fluid chambers, primary and secondary. One brake fluid chamber provides brake fluid to the rear brakes and the other provides brake fluid to the front brakes. The master cylinder contains a pressure differential switch (Item 7). If one of the hydraulic brake chambers does not provide pressure to the brakes, the pressure differential switch will illuminate a warning light in the vehicle instrument panel.
